root.description: Remove the LDAP context for this site.

response.name: binddn
response.description: Specify the distinguished name of a user with the search permission on the directory

response.name: hostname
response.description: Hostname or ip address of the ldap server eg: my.ldap.com

response.name: port
response.description: Specify the LDAP port if required, default is 389

response.name: ssl
response.description: Check Use SSL if the external LDAP server is configured for LDAP over SSL

response.name: queryfilter
response.description: You specify a query filter here, which narrows down the users, who can be part of this domain

response.name: searchbase
response.description: The search base defines the starting point for the search in the directory tree Example: dc=cloud,dc=com
